name: CardDealer: Simply 1 or 2 Plus
description:
Looking to pass the time with some cards? Try Simply 1 and 2 Plus.

Simply 1: Need to pick one random playing card from a deck of 52? Look no further, Card Dealer randomly deals the playing cards and stops on one card, and that's your card!

To be dealt the cards hit the deal button or shake your phone and the dealing will begin.

How many cards can you deal and keep under 100? What're the fewest cards you can take to get to 200? Make up your own games to pass the time.

Simple and fun!

2 Plus: Deals two cards, then choose whether to deal again or to take another card (or up to three).

Number cards are counted at face value, Jacks, Queens, and Kings are counted as 10 and Aces are counted as 11.

Have fun!
